TopicTitle: found game breaking glitch (idk) with the pistons allowing you to stay connected to the ground while in space.

Articles.Content: While messing around with pistons i tried to use them as a spring and i noticed a piston (my pistons' settings: https://imgur.com/a/SNFH4st) was very VERY VERY stretchy https://imgur.com/a/jDKIWRr its also very buggy that high in the sky.
Well, that's weird. I wonder if setting "motorized = no" makes it act normal? I wouldn't set the motor on and zero size, but that's just how my brain works.
I suspect a division by the motor size...

Setting "motorized" to "no" makes free moving piston (e.g. extending due to gravity only), no matter what extension you set. You should lock it.
Telescopic piston (especially the smaller one) tends to be very flexible out of its axis movement when force is applied to, it can be easily overextended too.
